attributes.action: Reduce the university tuition fee for the current academic year, 2020/21
attributes.additional_details: Many universities are now delivering all teaching virtually, with severely limited access to facilities and required resources. Online courses traditionally cost less than on-campus courses (see Open University course fees, http://www.open.ac.uk/courses/fees-and-funding) and with the current £9,250 fees already deemed too high, the case to reduce fees for the academic year 2020/21 should be strongly considered.
attributes.background: We are calling on the government to work with universities to significantly reduce tuition fees for the academic year 2020/21. As a result of the COVID-19 pandemic, students are not receiving the equivalent value or quality of tuition that they have paid for in previous years.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
